name: canshare-who5-mature-tnk-cell-histology
title: NZ WHO haematolymphoid mature T cell and natural killer cell neoplasm histology (5th edition)
description: Histologies used for mature T cell and natural killer cell neoplasm (WHO Classification of Tumours, Haematolymphoid Tumours, 5th edition) or an 'Other' value.
